Submodules

jaxfluids.stencils.derivative.deriv_fourth_order_center module

class jaxfluids.stencils.derivative.deriv_fourth_order_center.DerivativeFourthOrderCenter(nh: int, inactive_axis: List, offset: int = 0)[source]

Bases: jaxfluids.stencils.spatial_derivative.SpatialDerivative

4th order stencil for 1st derivative at the cell center

x

| | | | |
i-2 | i-1 | i | i+1 | i+2 |
| | | | |
derivative_xi(buffer: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, dxi: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, axis: int) → jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase[source]

Calculates the derivative in the direction indicated by axis.

Parameters

  • buffer (jax.Array) – Buffer for which the derivative will be calculated

  • dxi (jax.Array) – Cell sizes along axis direction

  • axis (int) – Spatial axis along which derivative is calculated

Returns

Buffer with numerical derivative

Return type

jax.Array

derivative_xi_xj(primes: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, dxi: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, dxj: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, i: int, j: int) → jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase[source]

Calculates the second derivative in the directions indicated by i and j.

Parameters

  • buffer (jax.Array) – Buffer for which the second derivative will be calculated

  • dxi (jax.Array) – Cell sizes along i direction

  • dxj (jax.Array) – Cell sizes along j direction

  • i (int) – Spatial axis along which derivative is calculated

  • j (int) – Spatial axis along which derivative is calculated

Returns

Buffer with numerical derivative

Return type

jax.Array
